title: Our Story
text1: Mapstories was created in 2021 as a collaboration between re:edu GmbH & Co.KG and Vamos e.V. The starting point of the project 'welt.weit.virtuell' was a co-creative lab on the global clothing industry. Mapstories served as a digital tool for students to independently engage in development education work on the aforementioned topic.
text2: Mapstories has already been used for successful projects and collaborations. After receiving positive feedback and numerous requests for improvements, a new version of Mapstories was released in June 2023. This version brings a wealth of enhancements and new features.
text3: you can find the previous version of Mapstories.
textVamosStart: Vamos e.V. is a development-oriented association in Münster. Since 1987, we have been advocating for:
textVamosList2: ecologically responsible use of the Earth
textVamosList3: more dignified working and living conditions worldwide
textVamosEnd: We provide concrete alternatives for action and inspire people to participate.
text_reedu: re:edu is a young start-up (spin-off of the Institute for Geoinformatics at the University of Münster) that offers solutions for education, research, sustainability, and participation - digital and open - for all people.
